hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Goron City#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Fire Temple Compass#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: This hint is in another castle.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.
